message.content:
cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.EC, cs.HC, cs.CY 

This paper deals with improving the effectiveness of comparison shopping agents (CSAs) by selectively disclosing prices. This involves using algorithms to decide which prices should be disclosed to the buyer. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.AI, which deals with artificial intelligence and machine learning. The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with the presentation of information to the buyer. The paper also involves economic theory (cs.EC) as it deals with inter-CSA competition. The paper also involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as it evaluates the effectiveness of the methods with human subjects. Finally, the paper involves cybersecurity (cs.CY) as it deals with the disclosure of sensitive information.
